entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023
